input: Can you find out the total amount of money from payment transaction order requests that were completed in the last month and had more than one recipient?

output.sql: SELECT SUM(TransactionCurrencyAmount) FROM BankAccountContractPaymentTransactionOrderRequest WHERE PlannedExecutionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND MoreRecipientsAvailableIndicator = TRUE;
